gameplay.avatars

Class Avatar

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.avatars.Avatar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Brute, Mage, Ranger

    public abstract class Avatar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an abstract player character in the game
    Author:
    shaylandias
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • spriteSheetKey

        protected java.lang.String spriteSheetKey
        Contains the sprites for this Avatar, in subclasses define which spot in the array corresponds to what image. - Needs to create attacks - Needs to not be able to move while standing attacking or dashing or shielding (movementControlled)- also works with the StatusEffect - Make GamePanel run the movement
